snippet: Catholics in New York reflected on divorce and communion after a statement issued by an assembly of bishops in the Vatican.

byline.contributor: Annie Correal, Emily Palmer and Eli Rosenberg contributed reporting.

abstract: Catholics across New York State struggle to interpret statement from Vatican synod, assembly of bishops, on place of divorced and remarried congregants within church; document does not explicitly address whether such people can receive communion; bishops were summoned by Pope Francis for three-week global assembly on family issues.
lead_paragraph: Catholics in New York reflected on divorce and communion after a statement issued by an assembly of bishops in the Vatican.

headline.print_headline: A Divide Over a Synod Statement on Family Matters
headline.main: Divide Over a Synod Statement on Family Matters
